#summary Installation Notes.

= Introduction =

This page is intended to provide the necessary information needed to install
the libraries and files needed to begin using capirca.


= Details =

==Install Ipaddr.py==
*Download http://code.google.com/p/ipaddr-py/

**Copy to python installation ./lib directory

==Install Ply==
*Download http://www.dabeaz.com/ply/

**In ply-3.3 directory, copy ./ply subdirectory to python lib

==Install Capirca libraries==
*Download http://code.google.com/p/capirca

**Copy to python installation ./lib directory

==Generate Naming, Policy, and Platform Generator Output==
*Import naming library and create naming object
{{{
  from capirca import naming
  defs = naming.Naming(‘../acl/def/’)
}}}
*Import policy library, read in the policy data, and create a policy object
{{{
  from capirca import policy
  conf = open(‘../acl/prod/pol/global.pol’).read()
  pol = policy.ParsePolicy(conf, defs, optimize=True)
}}}
*Import a Generator library and output a policy in the desired format
{{{
  from capirca import juniper
  for header in pol.headers:
    if ‘juniper’ in header.platforms:
      jcl = True …
  if jcl:
    output = juniper.Juniper(pol)

    print output
}}}
